page.title: 15 A WEEK'S NEWS
page.content: 130 crimes for the year. In Eaglesham there are three local newspapers.One called The Extra is a free paper.The other two are The Mercury and The East Kilbride News. This week The Mercury had on its front page an article about a summer playscheme for Eaglesham.Parents had been asked to attend a meeting but only three people had turned up.The cummunity education officer,who was in charge of the scheme said "Once again it seems unfortunate that Eaglesham should miss out on provision for their own young people,due to the lack of interest by the parents concerned."On page four the Eaglesham Music and Drama group were advertising for new members to play in a new play called "Lord Arthur Savile's Crime"to be in October.On the next page there was a small article about Mrs Resi Home,who
